level.text: The contracting officer shall direct any request for records which specifically cites the D.C. Freedom of Information Act (the “FOIA”), D.C. Code ยง1-1551 et seq. (1981), to the agency head or to the information officer designated by the agency head under ยง401 of chapter 4 of Title 1 of the D.C. Municipal Regulations (DCMR).

If a request for records contains no reference to the FOIA, and if the contracting officer is unsure whether the requested records can be released, the contracting officer shall forward the request to the agency information officer or agency head.
The contracting officer shall comply with requests from the information officer to provide documents for review.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority of this chapter is the District of Columbia Procurement Practices Act of 1985, D.C. Law 6-85, as amended, D.C. Code ยง1-1181.1 et seq. (1981).
